title: Unlimited monthly calls
info:
Unlimited calls Hello  Hello for 30 days at the price of 100 Afghani. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 
Send A UM to activate and D UM to 740

title: 70 minutes monthly
info:
70 minutes to all networks  Afghanistan for 30 days at the price of 90 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 
Send A OM to activate and D OM to 740 to deactivate

title: 500 minutes monthly
info:
500 minutes for 30 days at the price  90 Afghani. 
To activate, press the green button and to deactivate, press the red button. 
To activate A, send 90 and to deactivate D, send 90 to 740

title: 3000 minutes per month
info:
3000 minutes for 30 days at the price of 299 Afghanis.  
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate.  
To activate A, send 1500 and to deactivate D, send 1500 to 740
